TopicTitle: [WIP] Snack Launch System, simple and easy launcher.

Articles.Content:
This is an idea I had because some beginners are having trouble getting into orbit, as the launchers they use are much too complicated.

Here is my solution.

My SLS "Snack Launch System" component pack. As for models, I am working on them. As for textures, well, I need models first. As for Unity, well, I need textures and models first. As for KSP, well, I need textures, models in .mu, a mesh, a .cfg and stuff.

So, it's still a WIP. Here's what it will be: a first stage to take it to ~20kM and a second stage to take it to orbit. I am modeling the 2nd stage as of now.

2nd stage so far:

Please tell me what you think

Off to create something else already, are we?

tank on top of it.
Figured I'd revisit this project!
